column1: Smoque BBQ////The best part of the evening was that
column2: near the end of our meal
column3: another couple asked us (very politely) if we were almost done
column4: so they could have our seat (the place was very packed and there was a line outside the door for seating).  Apparently
column5: the staff thought that their intrusion was worth giving us 2 free peach cobblers to go
column6: even though we did not complain or show any hint of being offended.  This is service at its best.
